Push Back.description: Inserts an element at the end of a container.

Pop Back.description: Removes the last element from a container.

Push Front.description: Inserts an element at the beginning of a container.

Make Pair.description: Creates a pair object with two values.

Max Element.description: Finds the maximum element in a container.

Min Element.description: Finds the minimum element in a container.

Memset Function.description: Sets a block of memory to a particular value.

Sort Function.description: Sorts a container in ascending order.

body: sort(${0}, [](int a, int b) { return a > b; });
Reverse Sort Function.description: Sorts a container for array in descending order.

count funtion.description: Count the number of appearance in a certain iterable

Max Function.description: Finds the maximum of two values.

Min Function.description: Finds the minimum of two values.

Print New Line.description: Prints a new line using C++ cout.Useful for formatting output.
